website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for a constant stream of flowing water.
pros: Works well for all sorts of pets who prefer to drink moving water
Black color is a nice option vs. most that are light colored
cons: Smaller bowl might not be big enough for some pets
More prone to clogs than some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Loudest thing EVER.
customer_reviews.text: WTH? I guess I didn’t read the writing carefully enough because I missed the part where this is powered by a V16 caterpillar diesel earthmover engine. Oh Mylanta this is horrible. I think it’s gonna keep the neighbors up. The cats are scared to death of it, I kind of am too. I think they offer same-day delivery on this one because they’re just excited to get these cheap things out of the warehouse. Sorry guys, my cats aren’t used to jackhammers In their ears while they try to drink water so this is coming back. How about less cheap China junk on this app, its veering toward Wish quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: So frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this fountain for one month and now the parts aren’t fitting together well enough to get water to flow out. My cat loved it, but after a weekly cleaning I couldn’t get the slide over the bubbler tightly enough to keep the water flowing. It flows if I hold the slide down in EXACTLY the right place but I cannot do that 24/7. My cat is unhappy and I’m just plain mad.
customer_reviews.author: Sharbart

customer_reviews.title: Not for vacation use
customer_reviews.text: The water seemed to evaporate quickly; overnight, the water level was down about 1/4". We bought this to be used by our cat while we were on vacation (1 week). I also kept another bowl of water available in case he wouldn't drink from the scary new bowl. When we got home, this item was bone dry and NOT from my cat's drinking. He does not drink that much. I'm not sure if we burned the motor out. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: its ok but there are drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking product that works fairly well. It carbon filters your water and dogs also love the running water so it promotes them to drink more. This is not a " set it and forget it" fountain. It requires a thorough cleaning at least once a week and you must stay vigilant on always keeping a full bowl of water so you don't burn out your pump. I have a twenty pound dog and I must refill at least every 2 days. I would not recommend this product for anybody with large or multiple dogs
customer_reviews.author: Christoffer

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you are going to wash it often
customer_reviews.text: This thing works as it's supposed to. Reminds me of a fish tank sound. Low. It's small, didn't take up to much space. The overall product itself is 5 stars!!! The only thing I didn't like was you have to clean it more often than a water bowl itself. Pink mold was growing. I didn't realize you have to take it all apart and was. The black motor had a bunch of mold. If you're going to clean this one a week, I would recommend and it's a great product. If you're a bit lazy like me, much quicker and easier to wash the water bowl, then I would not recommend this. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: SheilaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Water EVERYWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: The reservoir tank does not work as advertised. The hole at the top makes filling the tank quite difficult, and then trying to screw on the cap while it's leaking out of the top is almost comical. Once you do finally manage to get it installed and mount it to the rest of the assembly, it FLOODS. The stopper does not work, the reservoir tank completely empties out into the already full bowl of water, giving the surrounding area an involuntary wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Petmate fountain. My other two have a reservoir and their several parts make it much more difficult to clean than this one. The ease of maintenance makes this fountain much more convenient than the others. However, as others have said, the pump can be god awfully noisy sometimes. When my others got noisy it was because they were gunky, but this one seems to prattle on on occasion, even when it was brand new. Whether this is a quality issue or design issue I don't know, but I know when it gets going it's incredibly annoying (to me. The cats don't seem to care).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was getting a bargain..
customer_reviews.text: Cats love this water bowl... However.. I received this bowl on December 15th, 2017. On Monday, January 29th, 2018, the pump stopped working. It never ran out of water, or became jammed with debris. I have 2 inside cats, who live to drink out of this, so I refill it daily, and clean it out completely twice a week. I'm thrilled my cats like it so much they're always in it (they HATED the Catit flower fountain), but, seriously, the pump didn't even last 7 weeks. So now I have to pay an additional $10.08 for a new pump. It's not a bargain anymore. Wonder how long this one will last.
customer_reviews.author: Luna's Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fountain. I read some reviews that said their fountain's motor became loud after the water level became low, but mine has been very quiet. Even after I dumped the water out and cleaned it today and there was very little water in it as I started to fill it back up it still wasn't what I would consider "loud". But the best benefit is that I catch my cat drinking from it so much more often than from my old gravety fed water bowl. I would say this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Noisy little thing, :(  Holds a lot of water :)
customer_reviews.text: It clogs up quickly, but I have a cat who uses it as a fingerbowl. Was very quiet the first night we had it, and noisy subsequently. We have had it for a week, and have had to clean it completely out once already thinking it might start running quietly again. No joy. This might be going back--it was too expensive not to work as advertised. The doggie drinks a lot more water from this than she did from her regular water bowl, so that's a plus. Noisy enough that the skittish cat is afraid to walk past it; that's a minus.
customer_reviews.author: cudesch

customer_reviews.title: Loud Pump
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I am ordering a replacement pump already, just under two months after receiving the fountain. Why am I already having a loud noise problem? It is clean and I have been attentive to the instructions, what gives? I called the 800#, 888 830 9638 and got commercials demanding I sign up for Dish, ADT etc and then 20 minutes later they tell me it is the wrong number to call. I get another # after going throug multiple levels of idiotic commercials like homless people demanding spare change. IT WAS THE SAME COMMERCIAL!!!!! Three pumps in as many weeks and I am disgusted with this whole scam! NEVER AGAIN. Save your dignity and go elsewhere!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: My cat will actually drink from this
customer_reviews.text: This has been working dependably for around a year now. Eventually, the motor will get some hair or particles in it and need to be replaced or be very noisy (despite attempts at cleaning) but I've only had to do that once. The second motor has been running silently for a few months, now. My cat can go a week or two without needing the water filled up, which is a welcome change from having a constantly hair/food filled water bowl. It will need to be changed once or twice a month, and has filters that will contribute to the life of the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: The reviews said it ran quite, was not the case for me. Gets annoying after a while! Was a little resistant to being put together. And with time this gets worse as I have had this model fountain before. In time the pump will fail if you are not using bottled water. Hard water deposits build up in the pump and slowly stop it. As well as collect on the sides and bottom of fountain. Very hard to remove!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Vent piece in front of filter will not go on. Other model is much better.
customer_reviews.text: Vent piece in front of filter will not go on. So we haven't used it yet. The three stars is because I have a different model which is a five star. The white one got noisy so I got the black one in anticipation of the original one dying. Just squeezing plastic parts back after cleaning solved the problem. The filter thing has become a family joke, as anyone who comes in the house is offered the opportunity to put the filter piece on, like a puzzle. Side note to anyone who uses these, they still need to be rinsed frequently, I spray with diluted bleach and rinse well, only non stick sponge scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Transplantwest

customer_reviews.title: Started quiet then got really loud.
customer_reviews.text: So I assembled this product around noon.. noise level was decent, quiet, barely even noticeable. However now it’s 2am, 12hrs after initial assembly and it’s so loud I can’t even sleep. I’ve tried checking everything is in place, unplugging and plugging back in, water level, nothing helps with the noise. I don’t know if mine is defective or if this is just how it is. It started out great and my cat was loving it, kept coming over for a drink. Now it’s way too loud, she won’t even come near it. I don’t know what to do to make it quiet again.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice overall!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husky/pit mix along with our smallfluffy white dog (rescue and I don't know his breed) and they seem to love it! We've had it for almost 6 months and no issues so far. It makes a loud noise when it's running out of water but only when it's to the point that the water level is so low there isn't enough for the stream to run. I do use purified water in it because we have well water. I definitely would've gotten the larger one and may upgrade one day because our pups empty this thing out pretty quickly but I wasn't sure if they would drink from it at first.
customer_reviews.author: Woman who buys too many random things on this website

customer_reviews.title: absolute piece of trash - do not waste money
customer_reviews.text: This is an update: We have had this water filter for TWO MONTHS. It was noisy. It needed to be refilled many times a day. Today, it just up and quit working, spilling water all over the floor, causing damage. It is now on it's way to the dump. Save your money, just get a bowl. I would give 0 stars if amazon allowed 0 star reviews. Absolute waste of $38.00.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coons

customer_reviews.title: It works but extremely noisy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the same fountain that was not working anymore after 10 or so years. While this one pumps the water just as the old one did the old one was quiet while this one is extremely noisy. I am not sure why but it seems that the housing is somehow vibrating. Seriously considering a different one.
customer_reviews.author: RadioChemistry

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with this purchase at all
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this purchase at all. It is very hard to snap the one piece on to make the water flow, I usually have to do it several times before it finally works. Also, I feel as if it doesn't work very well in general, I'm constantly cleaning it and changing the water because it's not filtering well. I only have one cat, this shouldn't be a problem. I have now gotten to the point where I don't even plug it in anymore and just use it as a regular water dish. I'm very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: H. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good little water fountain w/ filter
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fountain, and it seems like my dogs do too. It's fairly easy to take apart and clean, as well as refill the tank. When it has adequate water, it makes almost no noise, just a slight humming. When it runs low on water, it sounds like a siren going off. It will literally wake you up, so make sure you keep the tank filled! I've never heard something make the most god awful sound haha, but it's 100% my fault when it does so. However, the sound is a good reminder on when to fill it. Overall, I do recommend this as it works like it should for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this Water Dish
customer_reviews.text: This is so quiet. If you hear it at all it needs water. Just have to make sure you get the filter seated in so the "slide" portion goes in solid. Otherwise you need to reset that. I bought one for my winter home and loved it so when I got to my summer home I ordered a second one. If your cat or dog requires a drip motion this will not do that.
customer_reviews.author: EAN

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the fact that when you finally get it together, it's hard to get the flow to come down the shoot. You have to get it just right or it flows on the inside. Also, it doesn't hold enough water so keep a close eye on the level as the water is used and evaporates quickly. Be sure to keep the pump covered with water or it will burn out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Ok pet fountain
customer_reviews.text: its not overly noisy or overly difficult to clean. My only issue is that the water doesn't flow very fast, I wouldn't expected torrential pour but the trickle is minimal and it leaves my cat slightly disinterested. He still tries to drink from the sink and or toilet but I have seen him use the fountain so I guess it's pretty ok.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Amazing upgrade from last model!
customer_reviews.text: Love the improvement from their last fountain! The previous "stainless steel" fountain lasted two years but was most definitely not stainless steel. This new fountain has been completely redesigned, is easier to clean and plastic so my little fuzzball will not be drinking from the fountain by the tinged steel. Very happy with this item and the reservoir lasts even with a heavy drinker I only need to fill every few days!
customer_reviews.author: K8ers

customer_reviews.title: Pump is WAY louder than my older version of the same fountain.
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model for years and years and it was great and quiet as a whisper unless the water got low. This new one is LOUD! Out of control loud. Disappointed that it is so loud when the older one was so quiet you could barely tell it was on. Also, the old one had an on/off switch in the cord that was convenient. This one you have to actually unplug from the wall. Other than that, the fountain is pretty good. Keeps the water circulating. Cat seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R

customer_reviews.title: Water Stagnation Issue - Water Basin
customer_reviews.text: We've had an earlier version of this product, without the reservoir, which worked very well. We chose to try this version of the product, and were very disappointed to discover that the path of the water circuit left large areas of the basin stagnate, where debris would collect. This is a design flaw, and cannot be remedied by a replacement with the same product model.
customer_reviews.author: SuperTech

customer_reviews.title: It should last longer than 2 months ...
customer_reviews.text: At first, the waterflow was great. My cats have been using this watering system for 2 months and the waterflow is barely a trickle at this point. I've taken it all apart, cleaned, replaced the filter (2nd time now), put it back together and still barely any water flow. For the price, I expected it to last at least a year. I now need to find a replacement, unless there's a warranty on this one. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: J. Breseke

customer_reviews.title: Motor is very quiet and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Hello, The small water intake (Petmate Deluxe Fresh Flow) is for cats or a small dog and it runs great! It runs very quiet unlike the other reviews that I have read. I'm just hoping my 4 year old cat takes to the waterfall and water basin. Prior to buying, it was $16.00 and some change. I just remember seeing it for sale many years ago and it was pretty pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Pacstar

customer_reviews.title: This fountain was great for about 9 months
customer_reviews.text: This fountain was great for about 9 months. It's quiet until you need to add water, at which point it's noisy (which was good for me, because I liked the reminder). However, the pump started slowing down a couple months ago and stopped completely a few weeks ago. I just ordered a fountain from another brand to see if it lasts longer or if this is just the normal lifespan for a fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality but you need to clean it every filter change.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality fountain. I modify the posts on the lid to the filter to make it easier to get off. I just needs to sit on it. It doen't need to be locked/snapped down. When I change the filter, I totally take it apart and completely dry everything. Keeping it clean helps make the filters last longer also. A bottle cleaning brush and soft pipe cleaners help get in the hard to reach spaces. My pups love it and I like knowing they always have fresh flowing water.
customer_reviews.author: MasterTike6677

customer_reviews.title: Holds little water.  Pump very loud
customer_reviews.text: The low water holding wasn't the biggest problem with this it is the constant grinding noise the pump makes. It loud and obnoxious. I doubt I can get my money back but I already had to buy another water thing for my cats because this just was loud and half the time didn't pump anything.
customer_reviews.author: txmnj

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that pump is so noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Water fountain came almost completely assembled. It looks great but the pump is so noisy my cat won't come near it. Pet mate sent a replacement pump which was just as noisy. Gave it to a family member who has an older pump that is so quiet you barely know it is running.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no for me
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. The suction pads on the pump won’t stick to the fountain bottom. Nothing goes together correctly as it’s so cheaply made. I tried for 45 min to get it put together correctly but the parts don’t fit right as it is so cheap. (Well $16 what did I expect right lol). I threw it all back in the box and tossed it. I need a low to the ground fountain for my disabled older cat as he loves moving water but this is definitely not it.
customer_reviews.author: Glimmer88

customer_reviews.title: A bit noisy, but a good product
customer_reviews.text: We’ve always had the cat-sized fountain for our kitty, but she has advanced kidney disease now and drinks more water than most people I know. The dog size keeps her in water for a full day so it makes our life a bit easier. The only thing I’m not happy about is that the motor makes a lot more noise than her smaller one (it made NO noise), but we can live with it ... after all, it’s keeping our girl as healthy as she can be at this time in her life.
customer_reviews.author: Safari Lori

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This just did not work like I had hoped. It was not super easy to put together and the pump would come undone from the bottom and make noise even with water in the dish. It was too noisy for my cats who doubled down on demanding water from the bathroom faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Loud Pump
customer_reviews.text: I had this same model "Fresh Flow" and was very satisfied. I decided to replace it after many years. The new Fresh Flow came and I thought something was wrong with the pump because it was loud...so I ordered replacement pumps (yes I purchased 2) and they are loud too. Think I will probably unplug it and put a bowl of water out.
customer_reviews.author: LindaG

customer_reviews.title: get another option :/
customer_reviews.text: its difficult to put together. you have to judge with it just to get it right but then it pops out by itself anyways. the stream is more like someone pissing than a flat waterfall. i recommend getting one that shoots a stream out like a water fountain than this thing,
customer_reviews.author: Phriski

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so quiet I’ve had to keep checking it to make sure it’s even on! I love it. Most importantly my kittens are drinking from it completely uncoerced. Just got it so I haven’t cleaned it yet, but it looks like it should be pretty easy to clean. The only thing is the assembly and disassembly was a tad complicated at first. It should be fine once you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, didn't pump
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why, but the pump mine came with didn't pump hard enough to even get a trickle of water going. It ended up being an overpriced water bowl. I wanted to like it, since the design is nice and compact but it just didn't do the basic job of flowing water. Returned it and got something else
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it, and thats what matters!
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes it and thats all that matters! It is kinda noisy, an audible hum, but it doesnt bother my cat. And he took to it immediately. His other dish was broken, pump only worked periodically, and he hated the flower fountain, but this he likes!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Largent

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep water clean-would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't filter the water as I had hoped. There is constantly things at bottom of the brown, bits of what looks like dirt. I'm dumping the water out daily and rinsing it out. I thought that was the point of the filter by it really just seems to settle at the bottom. Doesn't really do what I had hoped it would do, which is keep the water cleaner for my pet. It isn't bits of debris from the charcoal filter either. Not impressed overall. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: My guys love this
customer_reviews.text: We bought this at first for our cat, but our dogs loves it just has much. This had made both of them drink much more throughout the day. It takes some cleaning and maintenance but well worth it. It comes apart easily so cleaning isn't a big deal. After I clean this I fill the reserve tank thing with ice to help keep the water cool and fresh for them. They seem to really like that. Even though this is a little more work then just filling a bowl with water, I feel its worth it. We have had this for about a year and a half now and its still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Richards

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Our Pugs love this water but we don’t. It isn’t easy to clean. The small filter gets clogged easily. You have to take everything apart to clean. Funk builds up quickly and we are finding that the filter that goes in it doesn’t clean to well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: This is our second of this brand and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second of this brand and it is by far the noisiest ever!! The loud "humming" can be heard two rooms away!! I took out the screen in the bowl and that helped somewhat but I have to unplug it every night. The first one was silent unless it needed to be cleaned so I took the pump apart, thinking something might be in it but it is new and clean -- just very noisy. If it weren't such a pain to do, I would send it back!!
customer_reviews.author: eleanor mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in April 2020. I am very pleased with it. There is virtually no water sound when running. I had a short period of time when the motor noise was loud and the water did not run quietly, but it was because the parts were not seated well. Once I fixed that issue, I cannot even hear the water running and the motor is very quiet. My cat loves it. It is easy to clean also.
customer_reviews.author: CherokeeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing, stylish, but noisy
customer_reviews.text: I love this pet fountain and so does my cat. There are no sounds of splashing water or potential spills. The pump pumps well and the water is filtered well. It looks great! However, it has a noisy pump that is audible throughout my small home. It is like an aquarium filter running at a moderate level in the background constantly. This one was to replace a 5 yr old one that ran MUCH more quietly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tebo

customer_reviews.title: It's a 5 but vibration in pump make it 3.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these bowls for over a decade now. The last one I had stopped working and it was missing a piece or two. Saw they were still sold so I got this. I'd give it 5 stars, but, the pump has vibration in it that annoys my cat so much, he drinks out of the dog bowl. Now if my dog, who is deaf, was using this bowl, no problem. Considering sending it back for, hopefully, a quieter pump.
customer_reviews.author: Shuggarplum

customer_reviews.title: Pump quite in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The unit is a little noise. It is hard to clean and mold builds up every week. We have had to change filter every week to help prevent the mold build up. Pump is to small for unit and does not circulate enough to keep water clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Karns

customer_reviews.title: Cat tongue leaves scratches.
customer_reviews.text: This product is fine for a short time. If you only have a cat then this will NOT last you longer than six months. When washing (pain in the rear!!! Too many parts.) the rough tongue of your cat leaves scratches in the bowl it's self. I thought it was hard water, so I scrubbed the life out of it. It turns out that the plastic is so soft/weak that the bowl gets ruined. I'm going for a metal/stainless steal one next.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh Dion

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it! And their customer service was awesome, My box did not include a pump, they quickly sent me one without any hassle. You can hear a humming noise, similar to a fish aquarium pump, but it’s not overly loud or disturbing to us.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, Quiet and cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: This water dish was easy to assemble, makes 0 noise, has great water capacity, and started flowing water the instant it was plugged in! Cats love it. This one is better than others we had in the past. I like that it will be easy to clean. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mjhwk

customer_reviews.title: Great water fountain and my pets love it.
customer_reviews.text: This has always been my favorite water flow dispenser. I had bought one several years ago at a big box store but once it broke couldn’t find a replacement. I was so happy to see it on Amazon. Will definitely buy again if necessary
customer_reviews.author: J R Pelayo

customer_reviews.title: The Petmate Deluxe Fresh Flow meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I only have to refill the reservoir maybe every 2-3 days depending on how often my pet drinks. I also like and appreciate the fact that she's continuously getting fresh water. However, I do find that like any other water bowl, I have to clean it from debris.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud water dripping noise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after having the same brand but 3 smaller units for over 20 years. The motor is too small for the larger water capacity which may be causing the loud water dripping noise that can be very annoying in my quiet home. In fact, it’s the same motor as their smallest fresh flow.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptagirl

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this fountain for over 10 years. It is very reliable, quiet (just a very slight hum from the motor), and very easy to assemble and clean. My cats like the fountain and drink from it frequently which is very important for feline health.
customer_reviews.author: tlarien

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t filter
customer_reviews.text: So I thought this dish would help keep the water clean , it does not. It doesn’t move the water around like it says it will and it doesn’t flow much at all. Getting it to snap together in the back is a huge problem like it doesn’t fit. I have to clean the dish more then once a day. There will be pet hair or dust in it and you will see it floating. Not sure what the point of the filter is if it doesn’t filter anything. I wouldn’t buy if I had known.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah K.

customer_reviews.title: I found a different brand at Goodwill today for $5 that works much better and will be making the trip home with me ...
customer_reviews.text: The way it fits together it has to be together tightly for the water to flow strongly down the slope. Within a couple of weeks of use it no longer fits tightly so there's nothing but a bare trickle going down the slope. This means the water isn't circulating the way it should which defeats the entire purpose. I found a different brand at Goodwill today for $5 that works much better and will be making the trip home with me while this one probably won't.
customer_reviews.author: Merri

customer_reviews.title: Too Loud!!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it ran too loud. When I first filled it up and plugged it in, it was quiet, but a half hour later, it was almost as loud as the dryer. I tried cleaning it out really well, double checked the pump was still seated where it originally was, refilled, and same thing: it was quiet for a few minutes then started humming, loud. I had the smaller version (108 oz I think?) and never had a problem with it for 6 years. I think I'll try another one of those.
customer_reviews.author: Dipenkara

customer_reviews.title: Nice water fountain!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this peticular item for years. It works really well and my cats always loved it for the running water feature. It is very quiet when running so it doesn't freak your animals out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: guitar man

customer_reviews.title: Drowning a mad hornet
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and thought it would be a good starting product. The cats loved the water slope/ramp aspect but that is where all pro stopped. The plastic body is not very well constructed and is very difficult to get in it's proper order, causing messes while struggling with it. The pump included was very VERY noisy. Even to the point I took it apart and put noslip padding under it to absorb vibration and even then it sounded like a mad hornet, drowning. I understand these can get loud when dirty but this was from brand new, unused condition. I can't recommend this product. It is cumbersome and I think I mentioned VERY NOISY.
customer_reviews.author: Tavistock

customer_reviews.title: i guess I really like fountains, however this was one of my dumber ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what I was thinking!!! i guess I really like fountains, however this was one of my dumber purchases! It makes a lot of noise after the first day and no amount of fiddling with it makes it quiet again,and we are talking about critters that will drink from the toilet if you don't keep the lid down! I wish I could say I'd had a bottle of wine before I bought this :(
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my adorably fat kitty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my adorably fat kitty, hearing about how flowing water is much better for a cat's urinary track and kidneys then water left standing stagnant in a bowl. It took a very short time for her to get used to it, but now she's drinking out of it very regularly. The maintenance is real easy and it does keep a fresh water supply for your cat if you happen to be away for a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Lavina K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Louder than your animals......
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is easy to assemble and large enough for a big dog or several small ones. My cat loves it too. But the noise from the pump and trickling water is ridiculously loud. I have it in my office and need to turn it off to think or when I'm on the phone. Avoid this one unless you plan on placing it an area where noise is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cole

customer_reviews.title: Love it, jumbo for Maine Coon cat
customer_reviews.text: Love it , so does my Maine Coon which is why I bought the jumbo size. Very quiet and nice to watch too as water cascades down ramp and gently swirls around the dish... it's a little pond. FYI After a couple of days I heard the sound of trickling water which I don't like, I wanted a silent cascade. I tracked it down. I removed the top lid and found some water was spilling over the back edge of the filter compartment. Pulling the filter up slightly took care of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bajza

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend this model
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous model Petmate water bowl, smaller and white and I don't know the model number. It was MUCH easier to clean and the pieces fit better together. This model is noisy and difficult to clean because it has a lot of edges and bumps, just areas that make it harder to reach and the pieces don't fit together well making it difficult to put back. The previous model I had worked for years before it cracked, and I loved it. Unfortunately, I would not recommend this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Water Circulates but Slowly
customer_reviews.text: My cats really like the fountain, but they like to drink from the running water. I wish the opening for the water to run into the basin was larger. Water would circulate faster and more freely, too.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great cat fountain!
customer_reviews.text: My cats drink twice the amount of water that they previously drank. And for 2 renal failure kitties that's really important. It is fairly easy to clean. It's as easy as any other fountain I've ever owned. Clean it every week, make sure you clean the pump as directed and change the filter once a month. It's very easy to fill the reservoir. I do highly recommend for all pet fountains to use filtered water. Like a filter attached to your faucet or a filtered pitcher or filtered from your fridge. It helps keep the fountain cleaner longer, less slimy towards the end of the week and it just tastes better for your pets. It's also very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Reservoir breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: The reservoir is made out of two halves of plastic stuck together instead of being molded out of one piece of plastic. This mean it breaks very easily. One drop or bump can open the seam of the reservoir rendering it useless. I would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bolin

customer_reviews.title: They love the fountain
customer_reviews.text: I have six cats and wanted to make sure that they have fresh water available all the time. They love the fountain! It seems that they have increased how much they drink per day (which will help their kidneys). They really like the fact that it is moving water, it would seem. The assembly was easy, and maintenance is even easier. The filters are simple to replace. In the few months that I have had it, there have been no issues with it. My only complaint might be that it is a little louder than I expected, but it is not in any way loud.
customer_reviews.author: A Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Cat Water Fountain
customer_reviews.text: 1. Our cats love running water and almost always drink from the running stream of water. 2. They are fascinated by the running water. 3. The filters are a little pricey but apparently do help with the taste of the water. 4. On the negative side, these fountains are quickly messed up with dropped catfood in the water and cleaning these fountains is a chore but necessary. 5. Disassembly of all parts for cleaning frequently must be done and at least the manufacturer made disassembly possible for cleaning. 6. I would replace this fountain if it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed in this unit. I’ve had it less than a year and it leaks all the time. I had the first unit for over ten years and decided to buy another one when I got my new dog. This one let me down. I’ve tried everything to get it to stop leaking but nothing has worked.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but the pump is very noisy
customer_reviews.text: I love these fountains, but the pumps on the latest models are VERY loud. I'm glad I saved the pump from the old one because I did have to swap it out.
customer_reviews.author: StaceyC

customer_reviews.title: Not for playful overly curious cats...unless you do not use the filter!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Unfortunately my cat can see the filter peeking through the water dispensing opening, only an inch but enough for him to put his paw in and grab the filter. My older cars did not bother it but this younger cat was obsessed with it. It is the only bowl I've ever observed him drinking out of as he appears to need flowing water. I just don't use the filter. And change it more often. The water is already filtered when I put it in. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: GGandMolly

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The lid is very hard to keep pushing on, not sure if it's broke or what because my last one was not. My fault but I got the black one because I thought maybe it would not look as dirty as fast but it's really small for my two dogs when it is low in water it is very noisy and vibrates my ceramic floor
customer_reviews.author: Jean Brynes

customer_reviews.title: noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is the latest in a series of this model of Petmate fountains I've bought and been very happy with. I'm disappointed by how noisy this one is. Other than that, it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: M. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for another Fresh Flow Pet Fountain that I had for nearly 10 years. The on-off switch on the old fountain came apart and I could not get it back together, so I ordered a new fountain. This is a great product. The water capacity is a bit smaller than my old one, but I couldn't tell from the description if it was the same size because I hadn't kept any of the paperwork on the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on 4/30/20, I'm now throwing it out. There isn't any filtering power to speak of and the water quit flowing about a month in. I attempted replacing the filter and putting everything back together again, but no luck. I would highly recommend shopping for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Wimpster

customer_reviews.title: I believe this product is defective.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this particular cat fountain because I liked the two that I owned previously. It looks just like the previous ones, but there are problems. 1. It makes a noise all the time. The motor hums pretty loudly, and I cannot make it stop. It is distracting and annoying. 2. I cannot actually take it apart to clean it. The places where it snaps together, meaning the curved top into the bottom tray, will not come apart. I never had this problem before, and now all I can do is remove the little crescent shaped top and the water reservoir. I cannot get to the motor at all. I am not happy with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pet water option. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely watch videos to see how to assemble and clean. But once you have done it the first time it’s easy. Super quiet. Holds a lot of water. Great value! High quality! Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Tietjen

customer_reviews.title: Crazy loud!
customer_reviews.text: I had such high expectations for this Petmate fountain but within a month, the thing had gotten so loud I had to literally, pull the plug on it. I disassembled it, clean it as per instructions and no change. I now have a $33.00 plastic bowl sitting on the floor. I rarely post a negative review but this product deserves it. This Petmate is now Pet Hate.
customer_reviews.author: Snowsnake6

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this because the mini water auto gravity waterer ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because the mini water auto gravity waterer allowed mosquitoes to produce larva and a gecko to get in there so i wanted some running water. Its really quiet until the water level gets low. fill it up. it does require regular cleaning as it gets slimy every 4-8 days. after several months the water seems to stop flowing so well. i took it all apart to clean the pieces and noticed the pump had slime and hair clogging the pump area. once that was cleaned it was back to normal operating capacity. clean the unit often and do not forget the pump when it slows down.
customer_reviews.author: nolapunk

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled cat , only will drink from PetMate😸
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very particular! My old PetMate needed replacing so I bought two different water fountains and she wouldn’t use them😸 She went to the tub so I would run water for her and a bowl of water. Finally broke down and bought another PetMate😸 Happy cat now, she is back drinking happily!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie V

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect
customer_reviews.text: I enlarged my cat family by two, from one to three. The new "princess" likes her water nice and cold from the faucet. When I discovered pet fountains at the pet store, decided to check them out on Amazon. This fountain was one of the more reasonable ones, and it works great. All three cats seem to be drinking more water, which is good especially in summer heat. The "princess" is the only one to drink from the fountain part, but she now stays away from the bathroom counter ~ Success! Highly recommend this fountain if you're in the market!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Lover

customer_reviews.title: My cat enjoys it 🙃
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, not too noisy. My kitty seems to love it! I was very worried about her because she was dehydrated, and she’s been very interested in her new water bowl!
customer_reviews.author: MissyB

customer_reviews.title: Works great but...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is quiet. Cat turned out to be allergic to plastic and got chin acne from it so I had to get rid of it. I like it because it's smaller than the giant stainless steel one I already was using.
customer_reviews.author: Dawny

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: This does not hold very much water at all. The filter is basically useless, withina day there was grit everywhere. I actually threw this product away yesterday, I was so disappointed iwth it.
customer_reviews.author: klsmith309

customer_reviews.title: My first experience with a cat fountain - no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Since my cats are constantly begging at the sink for me to turn on the faucet, I figured it was time to get a pet fountain. This was the most affordable product I could find on Amazon, and so I figured I'd give it a try. Suits their needs perfectly! The cats are drinking more water (which was the most important benefit), and they don't beg at the sink nearly as much. The water "trickles" out, not really like a fountain, but more like a slide. It was easy to assemble, and doesn't make hardly any noise. I top it off every day, and it works well for my house of three cats. Good buy, and priced well!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the water circulating
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cats, if you will be using it for a dog you might want a bigger one otherwise you will be filling it up every other day
customer_reviews.author: Caren Root

customer_reviews.title: Good Inexpensive Cat Fresh Flow
customer_reviews.text: I like the Petmate Delux Fresh Flow. The only reason I didn’t give it a 5 star is because I still catch my cat jumping up to the kitchen sink occasionally for a drink.
customer_reviews.author: K. Garvin

customer_reviews.title: Flowing water perfect for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Great product, help my dog drink great quality water. He did not like drinking water that is not flowing, so this is perfect. It lasts for years
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product but after only 2 1/2 months the ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product but after only 2 1/2 months the motor needs to be replaced! I bought a 6 pack of filters so I'd hate to waste them by buying another brand water station. Do not buy this unless you are willing to keep buying replacement motors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great and silently
customer_reviews.text: Our old Petmate Fresh Flow fountain still works great, but our aging cats need fresh water on both levels of the house. So we moved the old one to the basement and installed the new one on the main floor. I love how much water this hold and how quiet it is. I put it on an inverted plastic shoe box to keep the water cleaner (we have hard wood floors, no matter how often I sweep, there is always cat hair moving around) and the cats don't have to stoop so low to drink. The parts are dishwasher safe (except the reservoir tank). I wash it weekly in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: KG Lively

customer_reviews.title: Save your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Going to give this item 2 stars. The pump is load, scares off my puppies, they refused to get near it. The waterfall is not as described, it's a really narrow stream, does not match the description or photos. It's came pretty much assembled which makes me wonder if it was previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Don B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy pets, happy owners
customer_reviews.text: This Petmate pet fountain is the best! My two cats love it, and I don't find them drinking out of the toilet anymore. It's easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning, and can be used with or without the disposable filters. Although it's probably not recommended by the manufacturer, I run mine through the dishwasher on the top rack about every other month, even though I have not had any algae issues with this fountain - unlike others I have owned. It's quiet, and has adjustable flow to please the pickiest pet. I even sent one to my mother for her cats, and they love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Plesso

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this fountain in the past and something has changed. This item broke within a few weeks and now the amazon return code won’t work at the FedEx Store. All around crappy product. It’s flimsy, the waterfall is no longer adjustable and is basically a puddle of water versus a waterfall. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Chmielewski

customer_reviews.title: My cat approves
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and doesn't make too much noise. My cat really likes it and I think she has been drinking a lot more water since we got this.
customer_reviews.author: Bry_in

customer_reviews.title: Cute and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that my neighbor doesn't have to visit too frequently to care for my cat while we are at Disney World. It's a aesthetically pleasing little contraption. Only needs refilled every couple of days, and didn't take too long for my cat to warm up to it. (All I had to do was put a hair tie in it--nothing can keep her from those.)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: It seems very nice. Quiet
customer_reviews.text: It seems very nice. Quiet. Very Quiet. Easier to access the pump than in their previous fountain and thus hopefully easier to clean. Unfortunately, so far my ungrateful cats are afraid of it and will not go near. Cats who two days ago were happily drinking mildew water out of their old fountain before anyone noticed something had gone terribly wrong with it. Hopefully they get used to it and come to appreciate it, as all around seems a better and better looking unit.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.J.

customer_reviews.title: It's nice. Dog is good with it
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Dog is good with it, not sure if my cat has drank water in the past week. She's a bit freaked by it whenever I see her go near it or if I force her upon it.. there is a low humming you can hear and I keep foegetting what it is. I'll get usedto it soon, hopefully the cat will or already is.
customer_reviews.author: Tahnee Page

customer_reviews.title: Save all the original packing boxes etc!!
customer_reviews.text: The pump never even started to dispense water over the water slide. This is my third one. The first even survived a Gulf Power surge to the house. The second lasted two years, and this one will not even begin to work.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Sharp

product_meta.title: Petmate Deluxe Fresh Flow
product_meta.description: Size:108 Oz| Color:BlackPetmate's Deluxe Fresh Flow Fountain provides pets with a delicious source of fresh water with less refills required for pet parents. This pet water bowl features a patented, sloping design that reduces splashing and ensures a quiet flow of water. Equipped with a UL-approved, submersible pump and charcoal filter, this pet waterer dispenses pure, oxygen-rich water. Providing pets fresh, circulating water encourages them to drink more, improving hydration and overall health. This cat and dog water dish includes a removable reservoir for convenient refilling, and the detachable power cord makes it easy to hand-wash the fountain. The Petmate Deluxe Fresh Flow Fountain is available in four sizes, ranging from 50 ounces to 216 ounces, to accommodate pets of any size or multi-pet households. The fountain is offered in "Bleached Linen" and "Black" for easy placement in any room of the home.
feature_bullets: WATER FOUNTAIN WATER DISPENSER: Cat & dog waterfall dispenser encourages pets to drink more with a continuous flow of fresh water. The automatic water bowl is equipped with submersible pump & charcoal filter to oxygenate water.

AUTOMATIC WATER DISPENSER: Holds 108 oz. Cat water bowl plugs easily into standard household outlets without the hassle of replacing batteries. Water reservoir & power cord easily detach for convenient hand washing.

FOOD & WATER: Keep pets fed with fresh food & water with a variety of our products. Check out our airtight dry food storage containers, bowls for kennels, gravity water bowls, automated food bowls & travel accessories.

Petmate: For over 50 years, we at Petmate are passionate about our dogs, cats & furry friends in general. Starting with the very first dog kennel, we've produced plenty of eco-friendly products that pets will love.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
